activities: VWR is a global company headquartered in Radnor, PA USA with operations throughout Europe.  As a global organization, VWR has implemented global Human Resources Information Systems and Processes to maximize the effectiveness and efficiency of VWR's Human Resources Management programs and activities.   The systems used to track Human Resource information for all VWR associates globally are located in the United States.  Although personal information for our employees in EU/EEA and Switzerland is housed in these US-based systems, the majority of personal information is accessed only by in-country Human Resources staff.
